message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $150?
I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $150. How about we meet in the middle at $165?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I am still aiming to keep my expenses lower. Could we perhaps settle on $145 for the product?
I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. How about we meet in the middle at $157.50?
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still looking to keep my spending below $150. Would it be possible to reach an agreement at $147.50?
